body: The short hair megane gives me hardcore shimimaru vibes.

Ok, there is a translation at his tag - popular - page 3 and it seems she has some kind of power to bring happiness to those that have sex with her and it's attached to a superstition related to a blue bird. Her father, although not blood related, made use of her power to gain prosperity for his company and forced her to have sex with many people (and gangbangs included as seen) for money, so yeah basically forced prostitution, so she ran away and mister here brought her in so he got rekt after they found her and she returned to protect him. In the end the effect of her powers are still there and he says that he wish for someday to finaly meet her again beliving in the miracle that she brought forth once to happen again.
Bruh what happened during the store owner part? Shit went from heaven to hell in the blink of an eye that's for sure
